title: Poster, "SOS Children's Village, Kinderdorf", ca. 1996
signed: Imprinted in golden-gray ink, lower left: Paul Rand
inscribed: Starting lower left quadrant down to lower right quadrant; imprinted in red 3/4 of letters: OS; in green: Kinderdorf®; in red: SOS; in blue: Children's Village®; in red: SOS; in green: Kinderdorf®; in red: SOS; in blue: Children's Village®; in red: SOS; in green: Kinderdorf®; in red (1/2 of O): SO; imprinted in black, vertically (facing in), upper left corner: Paul Rand, USA, 1996/Montage: Pieter Breughel, The Children's Games/ Kunsthistorisches Museum, Vienna
description: White ground, upper 3/4 of poster, upside down silhouette of person (probably a child) with arms outstretched.  Left 2/3, inside silhouette, part of a painting by Peter Breughel, "The Children's Games,"  depicting lots of children in many different colors (primarily brown) holding sticks and children jumping over two lines of children.  Right side of silhouette, solid black.  Title, imprinted repeatedly in red, blue, and green, diagonal slanting down towards right.
